Text:
Note: This is the final disc of season 3.

DVD 6 only contains "The Story so Far", a 40 min. recap of S2&3; thus no new material if you have already seen those.
So unless I hear a strong demand, I wont be uploading it.
I of course meant "recap of S1&2".

It has been so long since I've seen season 1&2 it would be great to have a recap.
